languages.text: "Вы взяли дело в свои руки слишком решительно, старший офицер! Задержания, допросы, наказания целых секторов... все это довело людей до кипения!" {n}— горько говорит Аврилла.{/n} "Теперь на нижних палубах — а точнее, в секторе Четвертый Складочный — забастовка. Участвуют три клана рабочих, но пассивно поддерживающих гораздо больше. Ситуация рискует перерасти в бунт, и... Когда я доложила об этом, в ответ пришел приказ выслать спецотряд и подавить забастовку с максимальной жесткостью".

"You were far too heavy-handed, Seneschal Werserian! Arrests, interrogations, mass punishments for entire sectors... It has driven the people to the brink!" {n}Vent says bitterly.{/n} "Now there is a strike on the lower decks — in Depot 4, to be precise. Three worker clans are involved, but many more are passively supporting them. The situation could degenerate into an all-out insurrection. But when I reported my concerns, the only response I received was an order to dispatch an assault unit and crush the strike with maximum force."
languages.original_text: "Вы взяли дело в свои руки слишком решительно, старший офицер! Задержания, допросы, наказания целых секторов... все это довело людей до кипения!" {n}— горько говорит Аврилла.{/n} "Теперь на нижних палубах — а точнее, в секторе Четвертый Складочный — забастовка. Участвуют три клана рабочих, но пассивно поддерживающих гораздо больше. Ситуация рискует перерасти в бунт, и... Когда я доложила об этом, в ответ пришел приказ выслать спецотряд и подавить забастовку с максимальной жесткостью".

It has driven the people to the brink!" {n}Vent says bitterly.{/n} "Now there is a strike on the lower decks — in Depot 4, to be precise. Three worker clans are involved, but many more are passively supporting them. The situation could degenerate into an all-out insurrection. But when I reported my concerns, the only response I received was an order to dispatch an assault unit and crush the strike with maximum force."

languages.text: “您的手段太残忍了，韦尔森总领！逮捕、审讯、对整个区域进行大规模惩处……这一切已经把人们逼上了绝路！”{n}温特苦涩地说着。{/n}“如今，底层甲板发生了罢工。准确地说，是在四号货栈。有三个工人氏族参与了这场罢工，但更多人在暗地里支持他们。眼下的情况随时可能会恶化成一场全面叛乱，但当我报告我的担忧时，我唯一得到的答复就是派遣一支突击队，用尽一切力量粉碎这场罢工。”
languages.original_text: "You were far too heavy-handed, Seneschal Werserian! Arrests, interrogations, mass punishments for entire sectors... It has driven the people to the brink!" {n}Vent says bitterly.{/n} "Now there is a strike on the lower decks — in Depot 4, to be precise. Three worker clans are involved, but many more are passively supporting them. The situation could degenerate into an all-out insurrection. But when I reported my concerns, the only response I received was an order to dispatch an assault unit and crush the strike with maximum force."

traits.locale_text: “您的手段太残忍了，韦尔森总领！逮捕、审讯、对整个区域进行大规模惩处……这一切已经把人们逼上了绝路！”{n}温特苦涩地说着。{/n}“如今，底层甲板发生了罢工。准确地说，是在四号货栈。有三个工人氏族参与了这场罢工，但更多人在暗地里支持他们。眼下的情况随时可能会恶化成一场全面叛乱，但当我报告我的担忧时，我唯一得到的答复就是派遣一支突击队，用尽一切力量粉碎这场罢工。”
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: «¡Senescal Werserian, sus acciones fueron desmesuradas! Arrestos, interrogatorios, castigos masivos a sectores enteros... ¡La gente está al límite!» {n}Vent continúa en tono amargo.{/n} «Ahora tenemos una huelga en las cubiertas inferiores. En el Depósito 4, para ser exacta. Hay tres clanes de trabajadores involucrados directamente, pero muchos otros les apoyan de forma pasiva. La situación podría desembocar en una insurrección abierta. Sin embargo, cuando informé de mis preocupaciones, la única respuesta que recibí fue una orden de enviar una unidad de asalto a aplastar la revuelta por la fuerza».
languages.original_text: "You were far too heavy-handed, Seneschal Werserian! Arrests, interrogations, mass punishments for entire sectors... It has driven the people to the brink!" {n}Vent says bitterly.{/n} "Now there is a strike on the lower decks — in Depot 4, to be precise. Three worker clans are involved, but many more are passively supporting them. The situation could degenerate into an all-out insurrection. But when I reported my concerns, the only response I received was an order to dispatch an assault unit and crush the strike with maximum force."

traits.locale_text: «¡Senescal Werserian, sus acciones fueron desmesuradas! Arrestos, interrogatorios, castigos masivos a sectores enteros... ¡La gente está al límite!» {n}Vent continúa en tono amargo.{/n} «Ahora tenemos una huelga en las cubiertas inferiores. En el Depósito 4, para ser exacta. Hay tres clanes de trabajadores involucrados directamente, pero muchos otros les apoyan de forma pasiva. La situación podría desembocar en una insurrección abierta. Sin embargo, cuando informé de mis preocupaciones, la única respuesta que recibí fue una orden de enviar una unidad de asalto a aplastar la revuelta por la fuerza».
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: 「ヴェルセリアン家令長、あなたはあまりにも強引でした！逮捕、尋問、各セクターへの集団処罰…それが人々を追い詰めたのです！」{n}ヴェントは苦々しげに言う。{/n}「今、下層デッキで…正確には第四倉庫でストライキが起きています。3つの労働者クランが関与していますが、それ以外にも多くの労働者が消極的な支持を表明しています。このままでは暴動に発展しかねません。ですが、私が懸念を報告したところ、返ってきたのは、突撃部隊を派遣し、最大限の武力でストライキを鎮圧せよという命令だけだったのです」
languages.original_text: "You were far too heavy-handed, Seneschal Werserian! Arrests, interrogations, mass punishments for entire sectors... It has driven the people to the brink!" {n}Vent says bitterly.{/n} "Now there is a strike on the lower decks — in Depot 4, to be precise. Three worker clans are involved, but many more are passively supporting them. The situation could degenerate into an all-out insurrection. But when I reported my concerns, the only response I received was an order to dispatch an assault unit and crush the strike with maximum force."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴェルセリアン家令長、あなたはあまりにも強引でした！逮捕、尋問、各セクターへの集団処罰…それが人々を追い詰めたのです！」{n}ヴェントは苦々しげに言う。{/n}「今、下層デッキで…正確には第四倉庫でストライキが起きています。3つの労働者クランが関与していますが、それ以外にも多くの労働者が消極的な支持を表明しています。このままでは暴動に発展しかねません。ですが、私が懸念を報告したところ、返ってきたのは、突撃部隊を派遣し、最大限の武力でストライキを鎮圧せよという命令だけだったのです」
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: "Ihr seid mit viel zu harter Hand vorgegangen, Truchsess Werserian! Verhaftungen, Verhöre, Kollektivstrafen für ganze Sektoren ... Das hat die Leute erst so weit getrieben!"{n}, beklagt Vent sich bitterlich.{/n} "Nun wird auf den Unterdecks gestreikt — genauer gesagt in Depot 4. Drei Arbeiterclans sind beteiligt, doch noch viele weitere unterstützen sie passiv. Die Situation könnte zu einem ausgewachsenen Aufstand eskalieren. Doch als ich meine Sorgen gemeldet habe, erhielt ich als Antwort nur einen Befehl, eine Sturmeinheit loszuschicken, um den Streik mit maximaler Gewalt niederzuschlagen."
languages.original_text: "You were far too heavy-handed, Seneschal Werserian! Arrests, interrogations, mass punishments for entire sectors... It has driven the people to the brink!" {n}Vent says bitterly.{/n} "Now there is a strike on the lower decks — in Depot 4, to be precise. Three worker clans are involved, but many more are passively supporting them. The situation could degenerate into an all-out insurrection. But when I reported my concerns, the only response I received was an order to dispatch an assault unit and crush the strike with maximum force."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid mit viel zu harter Hand vorgegangen, Truchsess Werserian! Verhaftungen, Verhöre, Kollektivstrafen für ganze Sektoren ... Das hat die Leute erst so weit getrieben!"{n}, beklagt Vent sich bitterlich.{/n} "Nun wird auf den Unterdecks gestreikt — genauer gesagt in Depot 4. Drei Arbeiterclans sind beteiligt, doch noch viele weitere unterstützen sie passiv. Die Situation könnte zu einem ausgewachsenen Aufstand eskalieren. Doch als ich meine Sorgen gemeldet habe, erhielt ich als Antwort nur einen Befehl, eine Sturmeinheit loszuschicken, um den Streik mit maximaler Gewalt niederzuschlagen."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: « Vous êtes allé trop loin, sénéchal Werserian ! Les arrestations arbitraires, les interrogatoires musclés, les sanctions collectives frappant des secteurs entiers... Les gens sont à bout ! {n}lâche Vent d'un ton amer.{/n} Par votre faute, nous avons une grève sur les ponts inférieurs... au dépôt 4, pour être exacte. Trois clans d'ouvriers sont activement impliqués, mais bien d'autres les soutiennent dans leur démarche. C'est une véritable poudrière qui pourrait donner lieu à une rébellion ouverte, mais quand j'ai signalé le problème, on m'a simplement répondu d'envoyer un escadron d'assaut pour réprimer le mouvement par la force. »
languages.original_text: "You were far too heavy-handed, Seneschal Werserian! Arrests, interrogations, mass punishments for entire sectors... It has driven the people to the brink!" {n}Vent says bitterly.{/n} "Now there is a strike on the lower decks — in Depot 4, to be precise. Three worker clans are involved, but many more are passively supporting them. The situation could degenerate into an all-out insurrection. But when I reported my concerns, the only response I received was an order to dispatch an assault unit and crush the strike with maximum force."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes allé trop loin, sénéchal Werserian ! Les arrestations arbitraires, les interrogatoires musclés, les sanctions collectives frappant des secteurs entiers... Les gens sont à bout ! {n}lâche Vent d'un ton amer.{/n} Par votre faute, nous avons une grève sur les ponts inférieurs... au dépôt 4, pour être exacte. Trois clans d'ouvriers sont activement impliqués, mais bien d'autres les soutiennent dans leur démarche. C'est une véritable poudrière qui pourrait donner lieu à une rébellion ouverte, mais quand j'ai signalé le problème, on m'a simplement répondu d'envoyer un escadron d'assaut pour réprimer le mouvement par la force. »
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: "Aşırı kuvvet uyguladınız Seneşal Werserian! Tutuklamalar, sorgular, sektörlere toplu cezalar... Milletin sabrı taştı!" {n}Vent'in üzüntüsü, sesinden anlaşılıyor.{/n} "Şimdi de alt güvertede, 4. Depo'da grev başlattılar. Üç işçi klanı greve önayak olmuş, diğer klanlar da el altından onları destekliyor. Durum, topyekûn bir isyana evrilebilir. Fakat endişelerimi bildirdiğimde aldığım tek yanıt, bir taarruz birimiyle grevi en etkili şekilde bastırma emri oldu."
languages.original_text: "You were far too heavy-handed, Seneschal Werserian! Arrests, interrogations, mass punishments for entire sectors... It has driven the people to the brink!" {n}Vent says bitterly.{/n} "Now there is a strike on the lower decks — in Depot 4, to be precise. Three worker clans are involved, but many more are passively supporting them. The situation could degenerate into an all-out insurrection. But when I reported my concerns, the only response I received was an order to dispatch an assault unit and crush the strike with maximum force."

traits.locale_text: "Aşırı kuvvet uyguladınız Seneşal Werserian! Tutuklamalar, sorgular, sektörlere toplu cezalar... Milletin sabrı taştı!" {n}Vent'in üzüntüsü, sesinden anlaşılıyor.{/n} "Şimdi de alt güvertede, Depo 4'te grev başlattılar. Üç işçi klanı greve önayak olmuş, diğer klanlar da el altından onları destekliyor. Durum, topyekûn bir isyana evrilebilir. Fakat endişelerimi bildirdiğimde aldığım tek yanıt, bir taarruz birimiyle grevi en etkili şekilde bastırmam yönünde oldu."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader
